mapper.select: SELECT p.project_name, p.project_startline || ' ~ ' || p.project_deadline, e.emp_name, p.project_type FROM project p, project_emp pe, emp e WHERE p.project_no = pe.project_no AND pe.emp_no = e.emp_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project (project_no, project_name, project_profit, project_client, project_startline, project_deadline, project_type, project_content, project_register, project_tech) VALUES(#{시퀀스 설정 필요}, #{project_name}, #{project_profit}, #{project_client}, #{project_startline}, #{project_deadline}, #{project_type}, #{project_content}, #{project_register},#{project_tech})
INSERT INTO project_emp ( project_no, emp_no, project_manager) VALUES(#{project_no, #{emp_no}, #{project_manager})
